ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Abashi finally responds... sort of
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I was originally thinking that the shield would be easier than the drum to implement, since for the shield you d only have to draw an item for the right
ygData.messageBody:
At 04:32 PM 10/11/00 -0500, you wrote:

>About the drum graphic...anybody else out there remember the Male Barbarian
>Shield Graphic? It was left out of the game, like the drum, and Brad
>stated that the patch would be too large to add them.
>
>Poof, then they added the shield.
>
>So, how many male barbarians out there use shields? Is it more the 100
>percent of Bards who use drums?
>
>Golias


I was originally thinking that the shield would be easier than the drum to
implement, since for the shield you'd only have to draw an item for the
right hand for male barbarians. I guess the drum would be a bit more
difficult since they'd have to draw it for the 3 races plus 2 genders for
the right hand.

I'd push for them to just try to get a real drum for half-elf, male bards
to make sure it works first.

===Windleaf "The Half-Elf Male Bard" on Bertox. :-)
